content.description: Beginning  on Draft Root Beer, climb the opening moves. Clip the first bolt and work up and left to an in-cut shelf. Clip the bolt and continue up and straight from here until you reach the anchor.
content.location: Begin at the same spot as Draft Root Beer

content.description:
Beginning on Draft Root Beer, climb up through the first two bolts. From here climb up and right and clip from a good jug. Work the difficult traverse into a corner. Clip again and climb the corner up to a large block jug and eventually around the arete. Clip again again and pull to the anchor. 

  5.8 Variation: Shown in RED on the beta photo. Bypass the tough traverse section and  Layback the crack as a more direct start for the route. Traditionally protect when necessary to reach the bolted line.
content.protection: 6 bolts to the anchor. Extend the last 3 bolts for better rope management

content.description: Start on the arete, and begin pulling through good holds. Angle up and right moving through a good side pull and edges to reach the anchor
content.location: To the right of Unnamed 5.10. Refer to photo when posted

content.description: This is the wall located directly behind the railroad boulder. The route Fitz's can be found here.
